other_tests.findings: No detectable mutations in any of the coding regions of the gene or its intronic junctions.
Decreased 25(OH)D, normal 1,25(OH)2D, elevated alkaline phosphatase and intact PTH, normal total serum calcium and magnesium, decreased phosphate.
1,25(OH)2D dose started at 0.25 Âµg/d; subsequent lab results showed improvement.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Height improved to the fifth percentile by age 9 years; normalized intact PTH and alkaline phosphatase when treatment doses were adjusted.
Slight decreases in ionized calcium observed at ages 4 years and 5 months but were asymptomatic.

other_tests.procedure_name: Surgical Stapling of the Ankle Growth Plates
other_tests.findings: Extensive bowing of bilateral lower extremities noted during physical examination.
